nodes.text: Docking Bay 21 was a docking bay located on the Core Worlds planet Coruscant. At some point prior to the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, the cyborg bounty hunter Beilert Valance parked his cruiser, the Broken Wing, in Docking Bay 21 and traveled to the BG-RT's Tavern and Spirits cantina in Level 1313. Upon returning to the bay following a shootout at the cantina, he was greeted by the Hidden Hand criminal syndicate's leader, Gwi, who offered him a job, claiming to be a humble messenger for the organization. Valance initially refused, but accepted the offer after hearing that his target was the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Vader.

Docking Bay 21 appeared in the first issue of the comic-book miniseries Star Wars: Target Vader. It was written by Robbie Thompson, illustrated by Marc Laming and Cris Bolson, and published by Marvel Comics on July 3, 2019.
